snippet: Christina Hull Paxson, the dean of the Woodrow Wilson School of Public and International Affairs at Princeton, will take over at Brown University on July 1.
abstract: Christina Hull Paxson, the dean of the Woodrow Wilson School of Public and International Affairs at Princeton University, will become president of Brown University.
lead_paragraph: Christina Hull Paxson, the dean of the Woodrow Wilson School of Public and International Affairs at Princeton, will take over at Brown University on July 1.

headline.seo: Christina Hull Paxson Chosen as President of Brown
headline.main: A Princeton Dean Is Named to Lead Brown
headline.print_headline: A Princeton Dean Is Named to Lead Brown
